alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Trempealeau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 15 at 8:29PM CST until December 15 at 8:45PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CST FOR EAST CENTRAL BUFFALO AND CENTRAL TREMPEALEAU COUNTIES... At 829 PM CST, a severe squall line capable of producing both tornadoes and extensive straight line wind damage was located over Arcadia, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. These dangerous storms will be near... Independence around 835 PM CST. Whitehall around 840 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Highway 95 And County D, Beach Corners, Chimney Rock, Elk Creek, Highway 95 And County C, North Creek and Tamarack. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
